column2: "Da bi Samson sii mu kɔr Timna
column3: na okohun ɔbaa bi wɔ hɔ a ofi Filistiafo mbabaa no mu."

column2: "Na ɔbae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ n'egya na ne na
column4: Mekohu ɔbaa bi wɔ Timna a ofi Filistiafo mbabaa no mu: dɛm ntsi afei hom nkɛgye no yer mma me."

column2: "Nna n'egya na ne na see no dɛ
column3: Ana ɔbaa biara nnyi wo nuanom mbabaa no mu
column5: na erokɔ akɔwar wɔ Filistiafo monomonomfo no mu yi? Na Samson see n'egya dɛ
column6: Kɛgye no ma me; na ɔnoara na mepɛ no dodow."

column2: "Nna n'egya na ne na dze wonnyim dɛ ofir EWURADZE; osiandɛ ɔhwehwɛɛ ɔkwan bi wɔ Filistiafo no ho. Afei aber no mu na Filistiafo na wɔhyɛ Israel do."
"Nna Samson
column5: na wodur Timna wenyin nture ho: na

column2: "Na EWURADZE no sunsum baa no do dzendzenndzen
column3: na ɔtsetseew no mu dɛ mbrɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛtsetsew apɔnkyeba mu
column4: nna hwee nndze ne nsamu: na ɔannka dza ɔyɛe no annkyerɛ n'egya anaa ne na."

column2: "Na osii mu kɔree
column3: na ɔnye ɔbaa no kɛkasae; na ɔsɔɔ Samson n'enyi dɛ."

column2: "Na n'ekyir mber kakra no ɔsanee kɔr dɛ orikehyia no
column3: na ɔmanee dɛ ɔrokɔhwɛ gyata fun no: na
column6: na ewo wɔ gyata honandua no mu."

column2: "Na ɔfae kitsaa ne nsamu kɔree
column4: na okodur n'egya na ne na nkyɛn
column6: na wodzii: na ɔannka annkyerɛ hɔn dɛ oyii ewo no wɔ gyata honandua mu."

column2: "Na n'egya sii mu kɔr ɔbaa no nkyɛn
column3: na Samson too pon wɔ hɔ; dza nna mbrɛ mberantsɛ no tɔ dɛ wɔyɛ nye yi."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: wɔdze anyɛnkofo eduasa baa dɛ wɔmbɛka no ho."

column2: "Na Samson see hɔn dɛ
column3: Afei wɔmma memma hom abrɔme bi: sɛ hom tum hu ka kyerɛ me wɔ aponto nda esuon yi mu a
column4: ɔno mebɛma hom ndwera ntar eduasa na nkatado asorɔtow eduasa:"

column2: "na sɛ hom ennhu annka annkyerɛ me a
column3: ɔno hom mma me ndwera ntar eduasa na nkatado asorɔtow eduasa. Na wɔsee no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Odzidzifo no mu na edziban fi bae
column4: Na ɔhoɔdzenfo no mu na dɔkɔdɔkɔ fi bae. Na ndaansa na wonntum nnkyerɛ abrɔme no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia esuon no
column3: wɔsee Samson ne yer no dɛ
column6: amma yaammfa ogya annhyew ɔwo na w'egya fi: ana hom behyiaa hɛn aabɔ hɛn epoo anaa? Ɔnntse dɛm bi a?"

column2: "Na Samson ne yer no sui tɔɔ no do
column5: na enndɔ me bi: ɔwo edze abrɔme ama me man mba
column6: na ennkaa nnkyerɛɛ me. Na ɔsee no dɛ
column8: m'egya na me na mpo mennkaa nnkyerɛɛ hɔn
column9: na ɔwo na menka nkyerɛ wo anaa?"

column2: "Na osui tɔɔ no do nda esuon no
column3: aber a hɔn aponto no si do no nyina: na ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia esuon no
column5: osiandɛ ɔhaaw no dodow na ɔbaa no kɛkaa abrɔme no kyerɛɛ ne man mba no."

column2: "Na da a otsia esuon no ansaana iwi rotɔ no kurow no mu mba no see no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na ɔyɛ dɔkɔdɔkɔ sen ewo? Na ebɛnadze na no ho yɛ dzen sen gyata: Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Sɛ hom ammfa me nantwi emmfuntum a

column2: "Na EWURADZE no sunsum baa no do dzendzenndzen
column4: na okokunkum hɔn mu mbarimba eduasa
column6: na ɔdze nkatado asorɔtow no maa hɔn a wɔkyerɛɛ abrɔme no. Na n'ebufuw dzɛwee
column7: na osii mu kɔr n'egya fie."

column2: "Na Samson ne yer no dze
column3: wɔdze no maa ne nyɛnko a odzii n'ekyir wɔ awar no mu no."
